movieInfo.movieDescription: A disabled former marine, Jake Sully, is sent to the planet Pandora to infiltrate the local tribe of the blue-skinned alien Na'vi and gather information for mining their valuable resources.It's also expected to explore more of the rich ecosystem.
movieInfo.movieCast: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldaña, Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang

movieInfo.movieDescription: The sun is about to be destroyed, and humans have built huge engines on the earth`s surfaces to help them find a new home. However, the road out into the universe is perilous.To save the earth,A battle against life and death begin.
movieInfo.movieCast: Wu Jing, Li Guangjie,Andy Lau, Li Xuejian

movieInfo.movieDescription: a movie blockbuster adaptation of legendary Demi-Gods and Semi-Devils from bestselling wuxia novel by Jin Yong. In the early years of Song Dynasty, the Khitan invaded the Song Dynasty and the two became mortal enemies.
movieInfo.movieCast: Donnie Yen, Kara Wai, Cya Liu, Yue Wu, Yuqi Chen

movieInfo.movieDescription: Gemma is a brilliant roboticist at a toy company who uses artificial intelligence to develop M3GAN, a life-like doll programmed to be a kid`s greatest companion and a parent`s greatest ally.
movieInfo.movieCast: Allison Williams, Violet McGraw, Ronny Chieng

movieInfo.movieDescription: After recruiting an unsuspecting actor desperate for money to help his sick daughter, they begin to execute their grand plan. The plan involves swapping out lotto balls to win the jackpot, a prize worth $100 million.
movieInfo.movieCast: Mark Lee, Jack Lim, Jaspers Lai, Huige, HaoRen, Patricia Mok, Mei Yan, Yuan Teng

movieInfo.movieDescription: When Mei Ling discovers that her daughter Kiki wants to further her studies in France, she takes it upon herself to learn French and earns more money so that she could accompany Kiki.
movieInfo.movieCast: Hazell Siow Li Xuan, Ong Ai Leng, Phei Yong, Loh Lai Kan, Felina Cheah, Ashlyn Yip Wen Jia, Crystal Woon Xin Yu

movieInfo.movieDescription: Dumped by her husband Jin Shui for a Vietnamese lady, Mei Lian continues to tend to the durian plantation left to her by her late father while she single-handedly raises her three children.
movieInfo.movieCast: Mark Lee, Yeo Yann Yann, Henry Thia, Glenn Yong, Gadrick Chin, Angeline Teoh

movieInfo.movieName: PUSS IN BOOTS: THE LAST WISH
movieInfo.movieDescription: Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll: he has burned through eight of his nine lives. Puss sets out on an epic journey to find the mythical Last Wish and restore his nine lives.
movieInfo.movieCast: Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Olivia Colman, Harvey Guillen, Samson Kayo, Wagner Moura

movieInfo.movieDescription: Commercial pilot Brodie Torrance makes an emergency landing after a ravaging storm damages his aeroplane. However, nailing the landing was just the start of his problems.
movieInfo.movieCast: Gerard Butler, Mike Colter, Yoson An, Daniella Pineda, Paul Ben-Victor

movieInfo.movieDescription: a young couple, who travel to an elite, remote, coastal island in order to dine at an exclusive restaurant where a mysterious chef has prepared a lavish, expensive menu.
movieInfo.movieCast: Ralph Fiennes, Anya Taylor-Joy, Nicholas Hoult, Hong Chau

movieInfo.movieDescription: In the bowels of the earth, there is a city of mummies! By imperial mandate, Princess Nefer must marry Thut. None of them wants marriage; Nefer because she craves freedom, and Thut because he is allergic to marriage.
movieInfo.movieCast: Sean Bean, Eleanor Tomlinson, Hugh Bonneville, Celia Imrie, Joe Thomas, Dan Starkey

movieInfo.movieDescription: Nearly 5,000 years after he was bestowed with the almighty powers of the Egyptian gods--and imprisoned just as quickly--Black Adam is freed from his earthly tomb, ready to unleash his unique form of justice on the modern world.
movieInfo.movieCast: Dwayne Johnson, Aldis Hodge, Pierce Brosnan

movieInfo.movieDescription: A mysterious mastermind and his team terrorise the banks of Chennai with a series of heists.

a boy named Amato came across a powerful robot named MechaBot. By outsmarting MechaBot and becoming its master, Amato can now utilize MechaBot’s unique ability to Mechanize everyday objects into high-tech devices.
movieInfo.movieCast: Armand Ezra, Muhamad Noradzlan Mohamad Nazir, Ielham Iskandar

movieInfo.movieDescription: It’s been just two months since they were trapped in the game of death that is Sword Art Online, and Kirito and Asuna continue their struggle at the vanguard of progress through the game. The fifth floor of Aincrad is a mazelike ruin, and the two dare to take pleasure in raiding it for the treasure it contains. Upon returning to the fourth floor, it’s time to do some questing on behalf of the Elf Lord Yofilis–but here begins Asuna’s discontent, for in doing so they will have to face her least favorite monster ever…
movieInfo.movieCast: Yoshitsugu Matsuoka, Haruka Tomatsu, Inori Minase, Hiroki Yasumoto

movieInfo.movieDescription: Queen Ramonda, Shuri, M`Baku, Okoye and the Dora Milaje fight to protect their nation from intervening world powers in the wake of King T`Challa`s death. As the Wakandans strive to embrace their next chapter, the heroes must band together with the help of War Dog Nakia and Everett Ross and forge a new path for the kingdom of Wakanda.
movieInfo.movieCast: Lupita Nyong'o, Danai Gurira, Martin Freeman, Letitia Wright, Winston Duke, Angela Bassett
